DOC.brief_summary: The lysine requirement of elderly female subjects 65-75 years old will be 40-45 mg/kg/day.
DOC.brief_title: Lysine Requirements of Elderly Female Subjects 65-75 Years Old.
DOC.detailed_description: Currently there are no studies on lysine requirement in the elderly. The goal of this study therefore is to measure the lysine requirement of female elderly subjects 65-75 years using the IAAO technique.
DOC.criteria: 6575 years old, non diabetic, not obese, willing to participate in the study. diabetes, obese.
DOC.keyword: lysine, indicator amino acid oxidation, elderly females
